wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.title: WFRP4e – Zero Wounds: Prone & Unconscious
wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.description: Handles Prone, Unconscious, and Wake Up effects for PCs and NPCs when Wounds drop to or rise from zero. Includes automatic modes, chat prompts, and configurable recipients.
wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.settings.enable: Enable or disable all features of this module.
Apply these rules to all player characters.
wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.settings.pcPron: How to handle Prone when a PC is reduced to 0 Wounds.
If enabled, sends a chat message when Prone is applied automatically to PCs.
wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.settings.pcUnco: How to handle Unconscious when a PC stays at 0 Wounds for the required number of Rounds.
If enabled, sends a chat message when the condition is applied automatically.
wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.settings.pcWake: How to handle removal of Unconscious when a PC regains Wounds.
If enabled, sends a chat message when the condition is removed automatically.
wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.settings.enable: Apply these rules to all non-player characters and creatures.
wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.settings.npcPro: How to handle Prone when an NPC is reduced to 0 Wounds.
Sends a chat message if Prone is applied automatically to NPCs.
wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.settings.npcUnc: How to handle Unconscious after the required number of Rounds.
Sends a chat message if the condition is applied automatically.
wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.settings.npcWak: How to handle removal of Unconscious when an NPC regains Wounds.
Sends a chat message if the condition is removed automatically.
wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.settings.pcReci: Who should receive messages related to Prone and Unconscious on PCs.
Who should be notified when PCs regain consciousness.
wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.settings.npcRec: Who should receive all messages related to NPCs / creatures.
wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.chat.message: {actorName} has been reduced to 0 Wounds. Falls
wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.chat.unconsciou: {actorName} has remained at 0 Wounds for too long (TB {tb}) and now falls
wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.chat.wake: {actorName} is no longer at 0 Wounds and may remove
